Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

are there any plugins that improve KSPs maneuver nodes?

It would be really great to get accurate estimated burn times, without having to do a test burn (bonus points for estimated RCS burn time, when the regular burn time is very short. Even more bonus points if mid-burn staging is taken into account). Also it's kind of annoying that they always snap to the wrong orbit, and that they get deleted when you switch to another vessel.

I know there are plugins like MechJeb, which automate pretty much every aspect of the game (and therefore eliminate the need for maneuver nodes), but that's not what i want. I want to plan my maneuvers myself, but having better tools for that would be nice.

This is the best maneuver node mod available at the moment:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47863-0-22

It just makes setting up maneuver nodes easier, but it does not change estimated burn times in any way...
I like MechJeb's node editor better than Precise Node.
The improved maneuver nodes will be stock soon
